message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you, and I'm confident it's worth $20,000. How does that sound?
I'm really interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $20,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down a bit. How about we settle on $17,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $17,000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to go up to $14,000, but that's my final offer. Can you meet me at that price?
